column5: Hello#Comma I'm Kirby. What's your <set name="topic">name</set>?
Hi <set name=""username""><star/></set>#Comma did I get your name right?
Hi <get name="username"/>#Comma <set name="topic">what do you do</set>?
Awesome! Can you help me out here? I will pay you for your help.

• Please? It's really urgent T.T
  • Why not? I'll pay you for your help.
  • If you are not willing to help#Comma I gg le larh. T.T
  • No no#Comma it's not what you think.
  • I really know no one else to help me with this.
  • I know you are a kind hearted soul right?
  • I won't take no for an answer.
  • I'll pay you more.
  • Seriously? You wouldn't even help a friend in trouble?
  • I will always remember your help if you would help me this time.

• NO. This is wrong. You are one step towards in aiding a crime. Never help anyone to transfer money. Especially someone you've never met in person!
  • Congratulations#Comma you are scammed. What you are going to do is a possible breaking of law.
  • Have you thought that the person you met online is part of a syndicate. The profile of the person is ambiguous.

• If I don't pay tomorrow I will get myself in a lawsuit. You will help won't you?
  • I'm stuck at camp. If I could I would have gone out and pay it myself.
  • After chatting you I realized you are someone I could trust.
  • It's definitely legal. I swear.
Bye <get name="username"/>#Comma hope you will consider about it.
